nodes.text: Bezz Drexx was a male senator in the Galactic Senate of the Republic during the Clone Wars. He received bribes from Passel Argente's uncle who was affiliated with the Separatists. However, he was exposed by Padmé Amidala and Sheltay Retrac in his mansion on Coruscant.
Bezz Drexx's species is not revealed in Spy Girls.
